name: Retour!
description:
Life is full of unexpected detours... especially for unemployed, hitch-hiking pianists.

This piece of interactive media is based on the 1945 noir film Detour directed by Edgar G. Ulmer.  It features many references to and pieces of music from the film itself. This project was intended as a challenge from some special friends...

Credits:

Programming: jteaaa#8556

Art: nannerbel#7777

Writing: Puddleon#0148 + HerpDerpity Purple#8535

Sounds: HerpDerpity Purple#8535

UI: Shroomsher#3333 + 意志#7883
